author: djrtwo
content:
Consensus layer specs `v1.4.0-beta.3` -- The Summoning -- released!

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.4.0-beta.3

This includes the mainnet kzg configuration! huge shout-out to <@550420431744794624>, <@420951281910284289> , and the many other people that  carried this tough project from inception to the secure configuration we have today.

Also, shout-out to <@504202741933932544> for finding a critical blob gossip condition late in the game!

This is intended for devnet-10 and beyond
